Package app.security.auth

Interface Auth

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthImpl
public interface Auth
Holds authorisation in the context of the each request.

Implemented class contains threadLocal attribute with an User object. SecurityFilter checks JWT token in the request cookie and fills auth.

In the controller attribute of this type storage the User object in the current request context.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    User getUser()
    Method for getting user from the current context.
    boolean isAuthenticated()
    Checks if current context contains authorisation.
    void setUser​(User user)
    Sets user to current context.

  • Method Details

    • isAuthenticated

      Checks if current context contains authorisation.
